translation.en: ♪ She'll wish for me and you ♪
translation.es: Deseará por ti y por mí

translation.en: I have to get comfortable here.
Could you just, um, slide over?
Sounds like everything's just right for our story:
translation.es: Parece que todo está perfectopara nuestro cuento:

translation.en: Grizelda Locks and the Three Yetis.
Is that like Goldilocks and the Three Bears? It's exactly like that!
translation.es: - ¿Es como Ricitos y los tres osos?- Exactamente igual.

translation.en: Story spinner, story spinner, zip, zap, zobble!
Time to tell a magic tale inside your story bubble!
translation.es: hora de contar un cuento mágicodentro de tu burbuja.

translation.en: a papa, a mama, and a little Yeti
translation.es: un papá yeti, una mamá y su hijo

translation.en: sat down to enjoy some yummy nummleberry porridge...
translation.es: que se sentaron a comercrema de bayas nom-nom.

translation.en: So the Yetis decided to take a pleasant walk in the forest while the porridge cooled off.
translation.es: Entonces, decidieron salir a caminarpor el bosque para que se enfriara.

translation.en: [Bartleby] Didn't you mean a swing through the forest?
Oh, Frookie! What a glorious day for a walk in the forest!
translation.es: Frookie, qué día preciosopara caminar por el bosque.

translation.en: Maybe the people who live in this...
translation.es: Tal vez quienes viven en esta casa

translation.en: um, house, will give us something to eat.
translation.es: Tal vez quienes viven en esta casa nos den de comer.

translation.en: Well, whoever lives here is going to be very disappointed they missed a surprise visit from a princess.
translation.es: Bueno, quien viva aquí se decepcionarápor haberse perdido mi visita sorpresa.
Claro, Frookie. Esperemos a que vuelvan.

translation.en: We should wait for them to come back, it's the least we can do.
translation.es: Claro, Frookie. Esperemos a que vuelvan. Al menos, hagamos eso.

translation.en: Ow! This chair is too hard.
What about this one? Whoa! It's too soft!
It's pretty good. Hmm, it's a little plain.
translation.es: Está bien. Es un poco simple.

translation.en: How thoughtful of them to leave some out in case we stopped by.
Mmm. Not bad. But it needs to be more rainbow-licious.
translation.es: No está mal, pero debe ser arcoiricioso.

translation.en: Hmm. Frookie-boo, I'm starting to see a pattern here.
translation.es: Fruki-pu, empiezo a ver un patrón.
¡el cambio de imagen hogareña de Grizelda!

translation.en: That's it, Grizmos! Bring in my signature razzle-dazzle!
translation.es: Eso es, grizmos.Traigan mi toque deslumbrante.

translation.en: [Grizeldalocks] Change that painting! More is better!
A nap is just what we deserve after all this hard work.
translation.es: Merecemos una siestadespués de tanto trabajo.

translation.en: This is the perfect napping spot!
We did such a good job.
They're going to be so happy.
they were surprised to see that somebody had wandered into their home.
translation.es: se sorprendieron al ver que alguienhabía entrado a su casa.

translation.en: [True] Papa's chair was covered in sparkles.
translation.es: La silla de papáestaba cubierta de brillos.

translation.en: [True] And Mama's porridge had rainbow sprinkles.
translation.es: La crema de mamátenía chispas de colores.

translation.en: [Bartleby] Oh, that's not good. That's bad.
translation.es: Eso no está bien. Es malo.

translation.en: [True] Little Yeti could hear someone sleeping in his bedroom!
translation.es: El pequeño yeti oyóque alguien dormía en su habitación.

translation.en: I'm Princess Grizeldalocks, I'm sure you've heard of me.
translation.es: ¡Hola! Soy la princesa Grizelda. Seguro que me conocen.

translation.en: Well, anyway, I jazzed up your place a little bit
translation.es: Bueno, en fin,les decoré su casa un poco y...

translation.en: I knew you'd think everything was just right!
[Bartleby] Wait, wait, wait. Back it up.
They loved it? I did not see that coming.
translation.es: ¿Les encantó? No me lo veía venir.

translation.en: Yep! Yetis like things yeti-ish... and sparkly.
translation.es: Sí, a los yetis les gustanlas cosas con brillos.

translation.en: Not too long, not too short,
translation.es: Ni muy largo ni muy corto

translation.en: and the amount of princess in it was just right.
translation.es: y tenía la dosis justa de princesa.

translation.en: You got another story in there, right?
